findings.title: Out of gas exception in transferLocks() and withdrawTokens()
findings.description: The function transferLocks() and withdrawTokens() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the depositsByWithdrawalAddress list. The function will be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in createMultipleLocks()
findings.description: The function createMultipleLocks() uses a loop for multiple locking and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long input list.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in whitelistAddress()
findings.description: The function whitelistAddress() uses a loop to whitelist addresses from a list and could be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long input list.

findings.title: Owner privilege escalation in WorthTokenSale
findings.description: The owner of WorthTokenSale has excessive privileges, allowing them to perform various actions such as whitelisting addresses, enabling/disabling contractUp and saleEnded, toggling whitelist, changing tokenPriceUsd and hardCap values, modifying min and max contribution, updating usdt and busd addresses, altering tokenDecimal and tokenAddr, withdrawing contract tokens and BNBs, and changing claim date.
